etymology.description: 亻(亻) (rén, "person") + 叚(叚) (jiǎ, phonetic) = person taking a leave -> holiday
etymology.interpretation: The character 假(假) (jià, "holiday") combines the semantic element 亻(亻) (rén, "person"), indicating a person or human activity, with the phonetic element 叚(叚) (jiǎ), suggesting the sound. This conveys the concept of a person taking time off, such as a holiday or vacation.

examples.chinese: 国庆假期来临了(國慶假期來臨了)。
examples.english: The National Day holiday has arrived.

examples.chinese: 他放假在家休息(他放假在家休息)，也计划和朋友出游(也計劃和朋友出遊)。
examples.pinyin: Tā fàngjià zài jiā xiūxí, yě jìhuà hé péngyǒu chūyóu.
examples.english: He is resting at home during his vacation, and he also plans to go out with his friends.

examples.chinese: 我们的假期很短暂(我們的假期很短暫)。
